text: 7.2-3 Ese 9.4-6, Lep 6.6, 9.4, 14.1, 22.4 Pen nɨgɨnek, ensel olap sub lɨm gup okok nɨb, God pel mɨdep ak tap kɨl tɨk lep ne ak dad owak. Apɨl, binɨb ne okok kɨlop kɨjɨkɨl tɨkɨnɨg, ensel omɨŋal omɨŋal yɨgen gel ownɨg gek okok kɨlop suk agɨl agak, Alad gɨm agak. Binɨb God chɨn ak nop dɨtep gɨpal okok, kɨjɨkɨl ak nebeŋ kɨlop alaŋ tɨkɨnɨgun agak. Kɨdek yɨgen ak yep lem, ap ñɨg solwala, lum awl, mab tap okok gɨ tɨmel gɨnɨmuŋ agak.
